This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] throw a 'NotAllowedError' when invoking navigator.getBattery() within cross-origin iframe
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "SecurityError: Failed to read a named property 'navigator' from 'Window': Blocked a frame with origin "https://web-platform.test:8444" from accessing a cross-origin frame."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
